Plot: A single mother is swept into a dark underworld, while her teenage son discovers a road that leads him to a secret underwater town.
Title: Lost River
Actors: Christina Hendricks, Iain De Caestecker, Saoirse Ronan, Matt Smith
tomatoConsensus: Lost River suggests that debuting writer-director Ryan Gosling may have a bright future as a filmmaker, but it doesn't hold together well enough to recommend on its own merit.
